node.title: Man killed in plane crash weeks after Blue Origin flight into space
node.description: Glen de Vries, a tech company founder who travelled to space with TV star William Shatner on a rocket owned by Jeff Bezos's company last month, is among two people killed in a small plane crash in New Jersey.
node.content:
["A man who travelled to space with TV star William Shatner last month has been killed in a small plane crash in a wooded area of northern New Jersey.", "The one-time space tourist Glen de Vries, 49, of New York City, and another man, Thomas P\u00a0Fischer, 54, of Hopatcong, were on board the single-engine Cessna 172 that went down on Thursday.", "Mr de Vries was an instrument-rated private pilot, and Mr Fischer owned a flight school.", "Authorities have not said who was piloting the small plane, but the National Transportation Safety Board is investigating.", "The plane left Essex County Airport in Caldwell, on the edge of the New York City area, and was headed to Sussex Airport, in rural north-western New Jersey, when the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) alerted public safety agencies to look for the missing plane around 3pm.", "Emergency crews found the wreckage in Hampton Township about an hour later, the FAA said.", "Mr de Vries, the co-founder of a tech company, took a 10-minute flight to the edge of space on October\u00a013 on board Blue Origin's New Shepard spacecraft with Shatner and two others.", "", "
Glen de Vries (right) and his New Shepard crewmates.(AP Photo: LM Otero, File)
", "\"It's going to take me a while to be able to describe it. It was incredible,\" de Vries said as he got his Blue Origin \"astronaut wings\" pinned onto his blue flight suit by Blue Origin founder Jeff Bezos.", "Blue Origin took to Twitter on Friday to pay tribute to Mr de Vries.", "\"We are devastated to hear of the sudden passing of Glen de Vries,\" it wrote.", "\"He brought so much life and energy to the entire Blue Origin team and to his fellow crewmates.", "\"His passion for aviation, his charitable work, and his dedication to his craft will long be revered and admired.\"", "Mr de Vries co-founded Medidata Solutions, a software company specialising in clinical research, and was the vice-chair of life sciences and health care at Dassault Systemes, which acquired Medidata in 2019.", "He had taken part in an auction for a seat on the first Blue Origin\u00a0flight and bought a seat on the second trip.", "AP"]
